DOC.HEAD: Current Quotations
DOC.TEXT: ``You have to respect this thing freedom when you think of the price it carries.'' _ Ioana Popescu, a 21-year-old medical student, as she looked at casualties lying on stretchers at the Bucharest emergency hospital.

``Anytime a black man rapes a white woman in Alabama, Florida or Georgia in the future, Americans for a Competent Federal Judicial System shall assassinate one federal judge, one attorney and one officer of the NAACP.'' _ Letter from an organization calling itself Americans for a Competent Federal Judicial System, which claimed responsibility for bombs that killed a federal judge and a civil rights lawyer.

``Why do I keep doing it? They say you can even get used to hanging if you hang long enough. I've been meaning to quit for two years, but can't find anyone else to do this.'' _ Edna Cooley, 88, who earns $11.10 a day from the National Weather Service for six daily weather observations and temperature checks, including one at 3 a.m., in the desert town of Austin, Nev.
